mapper.select: SELECT B.TIER_SEGMT_NO, B.VER, B.TIER_STRT_VAL, B.TIER_END_VAL, C1.COMMON_CD_NM, C.UNIT_APP_YN, C.UNIT_VAL, CASE WHEN C.UNIT_APP_YN = 'N' THEN TRUNCATE(C.RATE,2) WHEN C.UNIT_APP_YN = 'Y' THEN TRUNCATE(C.UNIT_RATE,2) END AS RATE, C1.SORT_NO FROM TPMBI_TIER_SET A, TPMBI_TIER_SEGMT B, TPMBI_TIER_SEGMT_RATE C LEFT OUTER JOIN TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL C1 ON C1.COMMON_GRP = C.GRP_CD and C1.COMMON_CD = C.TIER_LVL, TPMPD_RATE_ITM P3, TPMPD_PROD P1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.TIER_SET_CD = #{tierMng.tierSetCd} AND B.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND B.TIER_SET_CD = A.TIER_SET_CD AND B.VER = A.VER AND C.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND C.TIER_SET_CD = B.TIER_SET_CD AND C.VER = B.VER AND C.TIER_SEGMT_NO = B.TIER_SEGMT_NO AND P3.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND P3.RATE_ITM_CD = A.TIER_SET_CD AND P3.INACT_DT = '99991231' AND P1.SO_ID = P3.SO_ID AND P1.PROD_CD = P3.PROD_CD AND P1.INACT_DT = '99991231' ORDER BY A.SO_ID, A.TIER_SET_CD, B.TIER_SEGMT_NO, C1.SORT_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TPMBI_TIER_SET A, TPMBI_TIER_SEGMT B, TPMBI_TIER_SEGMT_RATE C LEFT OUTER JOIN TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL C1 ON C1.COMMON_GRP = C.GRP_CD and C1.COMMON_CD = C.TIER_LVL, TPMPD_RATE_ITM P3, TPMPD_PROD P1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.TIER_SET_CD = #{tierMng.tierSetCd} AND B.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND B.TIER_SET_CD = A.TIER_SET_CD AND B.VER = A.VER AND C.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND C.TIER_SET_CD = B.TIER_SET_CD AND C.VER = B.VER AND C.TIER_SEGMT_NO = B.TIER_SEGMT_NO AND P3.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND P3.RATE_ITM_CD = A.TIER_SET_CD AND P3.INACT_DT = '99991231' AND P1.SO_ID = P3.SO_ID AND P1.PROD_CD = P3.PROD_CD AND P1.INACT_DT = '99991231' ORDER BY A.SO_ID, A.TIER_SET_CD, B.TIER_SEGMT_NO, C1.SORT_NO
